params.instruction_str:
Look at these questions. Can you complete the sentences?

If you don't know or you're not sure which alternative is correct, you should study the unit(s) shown in English Grammar in Use.

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>
mcq_xml.multiAnswerFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="score"/><text> out of </text><val id="total"/><choose id="total"><sgl> question</sgl><pl> questions</pl></choose><text> correct.</text>
mcq_xml.markedFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="percent"/><text>% for this marked interaction.</text>

question.text: I hope nothing stops me _____ to the dance festival this year.
question.modelAnswerString: I hope nothing stops me going to the dance festival this year.

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>
mcq_xml.multiAnswerFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="score"/><text> out of </text><val id="total"/><choose id="total"><sgl> question</sgl><pl> questions</pl></choose><text> correct.</text>
mcq_xml.markedFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="percent"/><text>% for this marked interaction.</text>

question.text: Who have you arranged _____ while you're in London?
question.modelAnswerString: Who have you arranged to see while you're in London?

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>
mcq_xml.multiAnswerFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="score"/><text> out of </text><val id="total"/><choose id="total"><sgl> question</sgl><pl> questions</pl></choose><text> correct.</text>
mcq_xml.markedFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="percent"/><text>% for this marked interaction.</text>

question.text: I asked Sarah _____ for me outside the college.
question.modelAnswerString: I asked Sarah to wait for me outside the college.

params.text: Unit 55   Verb (+ object) + to ... (I want you to … etc.)
params.label: Study:

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>

question.text: When we were little, my sister and I used to argue a lot. I remember _____ with her over sweets and toys.
question.modelAnswerString: When we were little, my sister and I used to argue a lot. I remember fighting with her over sweets and toys.

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>

question.text: I couldn't help _____ that Alan's flat was rather dirty.
question.modelAnswerString: I couldn't help noticing that Alan's flat was rather dirty.

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>

question.text: The hospital my grandmother went to was very good. She liked _____ there.
question.modelAnswerString: The hospital my grandmother went to was very good. She liked being there.

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>

question.text: Would you like to have your hair shorter or would you rather _____ it long?
question.modelAnswerString: Would you like to have your hair shorter or would you rather keep it long?

question.text: 'I don't know what to do.' 'How about _____ Laura for some advice?'
question.modelAnswerString: 'I don't know what to do.' 'How about asking Laura for some advice?'

question.text: The first week in my new job was very difficult. I wasn't used _____ very young children.
question.modelAnswerString: The first week in my new job was very difficult. I wasn't used to teaching very young children.

question.text: We advertised our car for weeks before we finally succeeded _____ it.
question.modelAnswerString: We advertised our car for weeks before we finally succeeded in selling it.

question.text:
My boots are going to get very dirty when I go for a walk this afternoon. There's no point
_____ them now.
question.modelAnswerString:
My boots are going to get very dirty when I go for a walk this afternoon. There's no point
in cleaning them now.

question.text: Helen and I met last night _____ our trip to the mountains.
question.modelAnswerString: Helen and I met last night to organise our trip to the mountains.

question.text: The road is impossible _____ here. We'll have to cross at the traffic lights.
question.audioTranscript: I often have to work at the weekends.
question.modelAnswerString: The road is impossible to cross here. We'll have to cross at the traffic lights.

question.text: I've never learnt to dive. I'm afraid _____ my head on the bottom of the pool.
question.modelAnswerString: I've never learnt to dive. I'm afraid of hitting my head on the bottom of the pool.

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>

question.text: We all saw Laura _____ the race. It was a great moment.
question.modelAnswerString: We all saw Laura win the race. It was a great moment.

mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>

question.text: _____ to the top of the mountain, we sat and admired the view.
question.modelAnswerString: Having climbed to the top of the mountain, we sat and admired the view.

params.text: Unit 68   -ing clauses (Feeling tired, I went to bed early).
params.label: Study:
